channel.title: Group 1 on The Awakening
channel.description: Recent content in Group 1 on The Awakening

item.title: A Birthday Card for Swami
item.description: In this card I have written a lovely message for Swami and conveyed my birthday wishes to Swami. Swami’s picture is attached and I added decorations. Birthday Card Gallery References https://youtu.be/CHdrS1ZhD2k

item.title: Bhajan Dedication - Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
item.description: Bhajan - Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Your browser does not support the audio element. .marginauto { margin: 10px auto 20px; display: block; }

item.title: My Art & Craft
item.description: I have created an artwork of a mushroom. I used a paper cup and a paper bowl added to it with some colour paints. I also created a bunny puppet using some colour papers. My Artwork
